name: Growthbeans
features: Help each other to be more self-aware
Headline: Self-awareness for Growth & Well-being
ShortDescription: Growthbeans is a social enterprise that empowers individuals within communities to grow in a meaningful and connected world with Growthbeans. Growthbeans offers coaching-infused programmes to deepen self-awareness, strengthen people skills and enhance growth, well-being and inclusivity.
enhanced_description: Growthbeans is a social enterprise focused on self-awareness for growth and well-being. It empowers individuals within communities to grow in a meaningful and connected world. The platform offers coaching-infused programmes designed to deepen self-awareness, strengthen people skills, and enhance personal growth, well-being, and inclusivity. Key features include helping individuals find value beyond traditional job titles, fostering mutual self-awareness, and promoting a culture of continuous learning, sharing, and growth within an organization.
key_use_cases: Employee well-being and happiness improvement initiatives
Deepening self-awareness and personal development for employees
Strengthening interpersonal and people skills within the workforce
Fostering a continuous learning and growth culture
Promoting inclusivity and connection in the workplace
Supporting career exploration and internal mobility by finding value beyond job titles
competitive_advantages: Operates as a social enterprise, aligning with social impact goals
Utilizes a unique coaching-infused program methodology
Offers a holistic approach combining self-awareness, growth, well-being, and inclusivity
Specific focus on helping individuals find value and purpose beyond traditional job titles
implementation_scenarios: Structured coaching programs for employee cohorts
Workplace wellness and mental health initiatives
Learning and development workshops focused on soft skills and self-awareness
hr_functions_supported: Talent Management (specifically related to growth and career exploration)
Total Rewards (in the context of well-being as a non-monetary benefit)
roi_benefits: Increased individual self-awareness and personal growth
Strengthened people skills across the workforce
Fostered culture of continuous learning and development
primary_users: HR Professionals (for program implementation and management)
Learning & Development Professionals (for program delivery and oversight)
